officehours.openMessage:
OFFICE HOURS OPEN
This channel is not for discussion, only for questions related to your app or the API as a whole. This channel should be used instead of PMing Rioters.
officehours.closeMessage:
OFFICE HOURS CLOSED
If you wish to ask a question to a Rioter, send {botty} a `!ask <your question>` command. You will be mentioned the next time this channel opens.
If you don't have a question, but you would like to be here for the next time, react with a `:raised_hand:`
officehours.addedMessage: Your question is added to the queue, I will tag you with this message the next time #office-hours opens! If you happen to find the answer to your question, you can remove it with {removeCommand}

riotApiLibraries.languageList:
I have libraries for one of the following languages: {languages}
Choose one you like and reply with `!libs <your language>`.
riotApiLibraries.githubErrorList: I tried to get the languages from Github, but Github replied with status code
riotApiLibraries.githubErrorLanguage: I tried to get the language from Github, but Github replied with status code

lineTranslation.default: If you wish to have access to this Discord server, you must first agree to all of the rules below. You can agree with them by clicking the :white_check_mark: underneath each.
lineTranslation.fr: Pour accÃ©der au serveur Discord, vous devez d'abord accepter les rÃ¨gles ci-dessous. Pour accepter, cliquez sur le :white_check_mark: sous chaque rÃ¨gle.

lineTranslation.de: Um Zugang zu diesem Discord-Server zu erhalten, musst du zunÃ¤chst den Regeln zustimmen. Klicke dazu auf das :white_check_mark: unterhalb der Nachricht.

lineTranslation.default: I understand nobody here can help me with issues with any of Riot Games' games, reports, bans or installers. I understand this is not Riot Games' support, which is located at <https://support.riotgames.com/>. I know you can alternatively send an email to support@riotgames.com. This server is purely for interaction with the Riot API, Client API, or in-game/replay API.

Ce serveur est rÃ©servÃ© aux Ã©changes sur la Riot API, la Client API et les in-game/replay API.

Entiendo que esto no es el soporte de Riot Games, el cual esta localizado en <https://support.riotgames.com/>. Reconozco que alternativamente puedo enviar un correo a support@riotgames.com. Este servidor es para pura interacciÃ³n con el API de Riot, API del Cliente de LoL, o el API de in-game/replay.

Den offiziellen Riot Support finde ich unter <https://support.riotgames.com> oder Ã¼ber E-Mail unter support@riotgames.com. Dieser Server ist ausschlieÃŸlich fÃ¼r Interaktionen Zwecks der Riot-API, der Client-API und der Ingame-/Replay-API gedacht.

lineTranslation.default: I will not send messages or mention the Rioters, unless explicitly given permission for, or when I already were in an active conversation with that Rioter.
lineTranslation.fr: Je ne vais pas envoyer de message aux Rioters ou les mentionner, sauf autorisation explicite, ou si je suis dÃ©jÃ  en conversation avec le Rioter concernÃ©.
lineTranslation.es: No mandare mensajes o mencionare a los Rioters, a menos que me hayan dado permiso explÃ­citamente para hacerlo, o cuando ya hubiera estado en una conversaciÃ³n activa con ese Rioter.
lineTranslation.de: Ich werde keine Riot-Mitarbeiter direkt anschreiben oder in meinen Nachrichten taggen, solange ich nicht explizit die Erlaubnis dazu erhalten habe oder ich nicht auf eine aktive Unterhaltung antworte.

lineTranslation.default: If I have an issue that only a Rioter can provide a solution for, I will type `!ask`, followed by my question (for instance, `!ask It seems my application is stuck whenever I request something (HTTP 512); it does not happen on my developer key. The message in the JSON told me to contact the administrator!`) These questions will be answered during Office Hours.
lineTranslation.fr: Si j'ai un problÃ¨me que seul un Rioter peut rÃ©soudre, je vais taper `!ask` suivi de ma question en anglais (par exemple, `!ask It seems my application is stuck whenever I request something (HTTP 512); it does not happen on my developer key. The message in the JSON told me to contact the administrator!`). Pour de m'aider Ã  traduire, je peux mentionner `@Translator - French`. Les Rioters rÃ©pondront Ã  ces questions pendant les "Office Hours".
lineTranslation.es: Si tengo un problema en el que solo un Rioter pueda encontrar la soluciÃ³n, escribirÃ© el comando `!ask`, seguido de mi pregunta (por ejemplo, `!ask Parece que mi aplicaciÃ³n esta atorada cuando hago una request (HTTP 512); esto no pasa con mi llave de desarrollo. El mensaje en el JSON me dijo que contactara al administrador!) Estas preguntas serÃ¡n respondidas durante Office Hours.`
lineTranslation.de: Wenn ich eine Frage habe die nur ein Rioter beantworten kann, werde ich stattdessen die `!ask` Funktion verwenden (z.B. `!ask Meine Anwendung hat Probleme Anfragen an die API zu verarbeiten (HTTP 512); Die Serverantwort hat mich auf Kontakt mit einem Admin verwiesen`) Diese Fragen werden Ã¼blicherweise wÃ¤hrend der Office Hours beantwortet.

lineTranslation.default: I will be respectful. I won't spam, advertise or place NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content. My username, nickname and profile avatar are OK to use, and not offensive.
lineTranslation.fr: Je serai courtois et respectueux. Je ne vais pas spammer, faire de la pub ou poster du contenu inappropriÃ© ou NSFW (Not Safe For Work). Mon nom d'utilisateur, pseudo et image de profil ne sont ni inappropriÃ©s, ni offensants.

lineTranslation.default: If I run into an issue, I will find the appropriate channel, and search for my issue first. I will also check the pins in the Discord channel.
lineTranslation.fr: Si je rencontre un problÃ¨me, je vais d'abord me rendre dans le canal concernÃ© et y chercher mon problÃ¨me. Je vais aussi vÃ©rifier les messages Ã©pinglÃ©s du canal Discord.

lineTranslation.de: Falls ich ein Problem habe werde ich im entsprechenden Channel erst nach dem Problem suchen und dabei auch besonders auf die angehefteten Nachrichten achten.

lineTranslation.default: If I ignore any of the rules above, I understand I might get kicked from the server.
lineTranslation.fr: Je comprends que je pourrai Ãªtre exclu du serveur si je ne respecte l'une de ces rÃ¨gles.
